## Data generation function


```{r}
gen <- function(n) {
  sapply(1:1000, function(m) {
    x <- rnorm(n)
    sqrt(n)*mean(x)/sd(x)
  })
}
gen2 <- function(n) {
  sapply(1:1000, function(m) {
    x <- runif(n)
    sqrt(n)*(mean(x)-0.5)/sd(x)
  })
}
```

## Normal example

### n=10
```{r}
xx <- seq(-3,3, by=0.01)
yy <- dnorm(xx)

plot(density(gen(10)))
lines(xx,yy, col = 2)
```


### n=100
```{r}
plot(density(gen(100)))
lines(xx,yy, col = 2)
```


### n=1000
```{r}
plot(density(gen(1000)))
lines(xx,yy, col = 2)
```



## Uniform example

### n=10
```{r}

plot(density(gen2(10)))
lines(xx,yy, col = 2)
```


### n=100
```{r}
plot(density(gen2(100)))
lines(xx,yy, col = 2)
```


### n=1000
```{r}
plot(density(gen2(1000)))
lines(xx,yy, col = 2)
```
